name: BlessThisFood
0:
”Alexa, Bless This Food”
”Alexa, ask Bless This Food to get me a gratitude blessing”
”Alexa, open Bless this Food”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: bless this food
des: Use this Alexa skill to guide your prayers for saying grace at mealtimes, whether you are eating alone or in group. Alexa will select a random blessing from a free collection that can be extended with premium categories that are available for purchase. There is no better time to speak to God than when you are gathered around the dinner table with the ones you love!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
